#TBT From now on, weâ€™re going to take Thursday to tell you all a little bit of the history of X-presion. Itâ€™s been almost 1ï¸âƒ£0ï¸âƒ£years since we created 0ï¸âƒ£1ï¸âƒ£0ï¸âƒ£collection, a design inspired by the anime film @ghostintheshell hell that is currently in cinemas. At the time, we had a strong attraction for everything electronic and digital.ğŸ‘¾ğŸ’½ This was reflected in our designs through the use of 0 and 1 binary codes. It was even conveyed through our hair colors with help of Braille color. Weâ€™ve got 1000 stories we could tell you. Itâ€™s one of the best productions and the most underground that weâ€™ve done with an incredible team.
